StatefulServiceBase StatefulServiceBase Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Runtime
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.dll

Represents base class for Microsoft Service Fabric based stateful reliable service.

Edit

In this Article

public abstract class StatefulServiceBase : IStatefulUserServiceReplicaPublic MustInherit Class StatefulServiceBase
    Implements IStatefulUserServiceReplica
Inheritance
ObjectObject
StatefulServiceBaseStatefulServiceBase

Constructors

StatefulServiceBase(StatefulServiceContext, IStateProviderReplica) StatefulServiceBase(StatefulServiceContext, IStateProviderReplica)

Edit

Creates a new StatefulService.

protected StatefulServiceBase(StatefulServiceContext serviceContext, IStateProviderReplica stateProviderReplica)Protected Sub New(serviceContext As StatefulServiceContext, stateProviderReplica As IStateProviderReplica)
Parameters
serviceContext
StatefulServiceContext StatefulServiceContext

A StatefulServiceContext that describes the service context.

stateProviderReplica
IStateProviderReplica IStateProviderReplica

A IStateProviderReplica that represents a reliable state provider replica.

Properties

Context Context

Edit

Gets the service context that this stateful service is operating under. It provides information like ReplicaId, PartitionId, ServiceName etc.

public StatefulServiceContext Context { get; }Public ReadOnly Property Context As StatefulServiceContext
Value
StatefulServiceContext StatefulServiceContext

A StatefulServiceContext that describes the service context.

Partition Partition

Edit

Service partition to which current service replica belongs. 

protected IStatefulServicePartition Partition { get; }Protected ReadOnly Property Partition As IStatefulServicePartition
Value
IStatefulServicePartition IStatefulServicePartition

An IStatefulServicePartition that represents the partition to which this service replica belongs.

Methods

BackupAsync(BackupDescription) BackupAsync(BackupDescription)

Edit

Performs a backup of all reliable state managed by this StatefulServiceBase.

public Task BackupAsync(BackupDescription backupDescription)Public Function BackupAsync(backupDescription As BackupDescription) As Task
Parameters
backupDescription
BackupDescription BackupDescription

A BackupDescription describing the backup request.

Returns
Task Task

Task that represents the asynchronous backup operation.

BackupAsync(BackupDescription, TimeSpan, CancellationToken) BackupAsync(BackupDescription, TimeSpan, CancellationToken)

Edit

Performs a backup of all reliable state managed by this StatefulServiceBase.

public Task BackupAsync(BackupDescription backupDescription, TimeSpan timeout, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Public Function BackupAsync(backupDescription As BackupDescription, timeout As TimeSpan, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
Parameters
backupDescription
BackupDescription BackupDescription

A BackupDescription describing the backup request.

timeout
TimeSpan TimeSpan

The timeout for this operation.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

Task that represents the asynchronous backup operation.

Remarks

Boolean returned by the backupCallback indicate whether the service was able to successfully move the backup folder to an external location. If false is returned, BackupAsync throws InvalidOperationException with the relevant message indicating backupCallback returned false. Also, backup will be marked as unsuccessful.

CreateServiceReplicaListeners() CreateServiceReplicaListeners()

Edit

Override this method to supply the communication listeners for the service replica. The endpoints returned by the communication listener's are stored as a JSON string of ListenerName, Endpoint string pairs like {"Endpoints":{"Listener1":"Endpoint1","Listener2":"Endpoint2" ...}}

protected virtual IEnumerable<ServiceReplicaListener> CreateServiceReplicaListeners()Protected Overridable Function CreateServiceReplicaListeners As IEnumerable(Of ServiceReplicaListener)
Returns
IEnumerable<ServiceReplicaListener> IEnumerable(Of ServiceReplicaListener)

List of ServiceReplicaListeners

GetAddresses() GetAddresses()

Edit

Gets list of all the addresses for this service replica as (ListenerName, Endpoint) key-value pair.

protected IReadOnlyDictionary<string, string> GetAddresses()Protected Function GetAddresses As IReadOnlyDictionary(Of String, String)
Returns
IReadOnlyDictionary<String, String> IReadOnlyDictionary(Of String, String)

An IReadOnlyDictionary<TKey, TValue> containing list of addresses as (ListenerName, Endpoint) key-value pair.

OnAbort() OnAbort()

Edit

Notification that the service is being aborted. RunAsync MAY be running concurrently with the execution of this method, as cancellation is not awaited on the abort path.

protected virtual void OnAbort()Protected Overridable Sub OnAbort

OnChangeRoleAsync(ReplicaRole, CancellationToken) OnChangeRoleAsync(ReplicaRole, CancellationToken)

Edit

This method is called as the final step before completing ChangeRoleAsync(ReplicaRole, CancellationToken). Override this method to be notified that ChangeRole has completed for this replica's internal components.

protected virtual Task OnChangeRoleAsync(ReplicaRole newRole, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Protected Overridable Function OnChangeRoleAsync(newRole As ReplicaRole, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
Parameters
newRole
ReplicaRole ReplicaRole

New ReplicaRole for this service replica.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

A Task that represents outstanding operation.

OnCloseAsync(CancellationToken) OnCloseAsync(CancellationToken)

Edit

This method is called as the final step of closing the service. Override this method to be notified that Close has completed for this replica's internal components.

protected virtual Task OnCloseAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)Protected Overridable Function OnCloseAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
Parameters
cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

A Task that represents outstanding operation.

OnDataLossAsync(RestoreContext, CancellationToken) OnDataLossAsync(RestoreContext, CancellationToken)

Edit

This method is called during suspected data loss. You can override this method to restore the service in case of data loss.

protected virtual Task<bool> OnDataLossAsync(RestoreContext restoreCtx, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Protected Overridable Function OnDataLossAsync(restoreCtx As RestoreContext, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task(Of Boolean)
Parameters
restoreCtx
RestoreContext RestoreContext

A RestoreContext to be used to restore the service.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

CancellationToken to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task<Boolean> Task(Of Boolean)

A Task that represents the asynchronous restore operation. True indicates that the state has been restored. False indicates that the replica's state has not been modified.

OnOpenAsync(ReplicaOpenMode, CancellationToken) OnOpenAsync(ReplicaOpenMode, CancellationToken)

Edit

This method is called as the final step of opening the service. Override this method to be notified that Open has completed for this replica's internal components.

protected virtual Task OnOpenAsync(ReplicaOpenMode openMode, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Protected Overridable Function OnOpenAsync(openMode As ReplicaOpenMode, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
Parameters
openMode
ReplicaOpenMode ReplicaOpenMode

ReplicaOpenMode for this service replica.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

A Task that represents outstanding operation.

RunAsync(CancellationToken) RunAsync(CancellationToken)

Edit

Services that want to implement a processing loop which runs when it is primary and has write status, just override this method with their logic.

protected virtual Task RunAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)Protected Overridable Function RunAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
Parameters
cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

A Task that represents outstanding operation.
